resources.string: This is an image of the CS125 logo.
This is an image of the male character.
This is an image of the female character.

You are a CS125 student who has wandered into Siebel on a stormy Monday afternoon. You\'re frustrated with the MP so you decide to go to office hours to get help. But a long road stands between you and the help you so desperately need. When you meet Geoff, he appears to have gone mad… He demands you prove yourself worthy of his help and orders you traverse the dungeons of Siebel, answering the questions of all the deceased TA\'s of times past below. You steel yourself and bravely enter the dark unknowns…
Professor Geoffrey - Thank you for a fun semester and all of the effort you put into teaching!\n
The TAs, CAs, and CDs - You guys are the real MVPs. Thank you for your part in designing the course and helping during office hours! (Shout out to CS199 Staff as well)\n

Students of CS125 - First and foremost thank you for the dankest memes. They were literally what kept us going :D. But more importantly thank you for all of the amazing collaboration both on and off the forum! Congrats on completing the course!!!\n

AND LAST BUT NOT LEAST…





THANK YOU PEPE!!!
